**PromptTasker** is a powerful command-line tool that uses OpenAI's function calling to intelligently perform a wide range of tasks based on natural language prompts. Just describe what you want to do, and PromptTasker handles the rest â€” from processing files to executing queries.

## ğŸš€ Features

- ğŸ§¹ Format files (e.g., using Prettier)
- Finds Recent file names from a folder
- ğŸ–¼ Extract data from images
- ğŸ” Find similar content in files
- ğŸŒ Fetch data from APIs
- ğŸ—ƒ Execute SQL or DuckDB queries
- ğŸ“¦ Compress images
- ğŸ” Convert Markdown to HTML
- ğŸ“Š Filter CSV files with custom filters
